title: Beard Shaping & Hot Towel Shaves
summary: Straight-razor line ups, conditioning treatments, and signature hot towel shaves.
description: We sculpt beards and mustaches with razor-sharp precision. Finishing with hot towel compresses, essential oil-infused lather, and beard conditioning masks. Upgrade with a deluxe straight-razor shave and cold towel finish for extra polish.
processDescription: We pair aromatherapy steam treatments with razor-sharp detailing so your beard lines stay crisp without irritation.
